description: Example codes indicating the reason for a current status.  Note that these are in no way complete and might not even be appropriate for some uses.
name: GoalStatusReason

text.div:
Goal status reason

Example codes indicating the reason for a current status. Note that these are in no way complete and might not even be appropriate for some uses.

This value set includes codes from the following code systems:

  • Include all codes defined in http://hl7.org/fhir/goal-status-reason

title: Goal status reason
